Name: Chaos Unleashed
Story Background: In times of desperation, the chaotic forces of the world are harnessed and unleashed in a torrent of uncontrollable power, wreaking havoc upon the battlefield.
Ability: Chaos Unleashed deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.
Appearance Description: The card portrays a sinister maelstrom of swirling red and black energies, crackling with destructive power, while hapless figures are engulfed in the chaos, their forms distorted and rent asunder.
